location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Map of the area west of the border between Persia and Afghanistan

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paperDimensions: On sheet 532 x 662mm

mods.abstract: The map shows the area to the west of the border between Persia [Iran] and Afghanistan (between Koh-i-Malik Siah and Nusratabad).It depicts hydrology, including the river Helmand, and includes some indication of relief.The map bears the statements ‘Surveyed by Asghar Ali Beg, K. B., Surveyor, Survey of India. Topo. No. 2189.’ and ‘(Sd.) G. W. [George Washington] Brazier-Creagh, Surgeon Major, A. M. S., In charge Seistan Mission. 1897.’
